name: Ch.10ABaseConvo4
_source: speak;Forde;Heh, heh, heh...|Well, this is quite different from our usual marching routine.
speak;Forde;Princess Eirika's command is...|how should I put it?|Less rigid than Prince Ephraim's.
speak;Forde;Not at all.|Prince Ephraim would have us drilling from sunrise to sunset.|Princess Eirika seems to understand we're not just soldiers, but people.
speak;Forde;Prince Ephraim's orders were like his lance.|Sharp, precise, unrelenting.|Princess Eirika's are more like a gentle guide.
speak;Franz;You sound like you're starting to appreciate her leadership!
speak;Forde;Hah!|I've been in enough armies to know there's more than one way to lead.
speak;Franz;Prince Ephraim trusts her completely.|And she's proven herself in every battle.
speak;Forde;True enough.|Her strategy back in Renvall was quite impressive.
speak;Franz;That battle did go pretty smoothly, didn't it?|Battles aside, I'm just glad we're together again, brother.|Your experience means so much to me.
speak;Forde;I agree!|As your brother, someone has to keep you out of trouble.
speak;Franz;I feel like that's been more my job lately...
alert;Franz and Forde's support level has increased!
